name: LABS: The Platform Experiment
description: LABS (Lives Are Better Saved) co. has begun developing a new robotic prototype to help the people of the world! Being a recent hire at LABS, your job is to take control of this robot and test out its capabilities as you platform through test stages, defeat baddies, and collect “pedestrians” throughout to bring them to safety. Test new powers as you advance through the stages to determine the true limits of the prototype. Testing this new prototype is crucial to the company and the people. Because as we all know, “Lives Are Better Saved.”
